product_description.title: Superstar Shoes
product_description.subtitle: A tribute to classic basketball icon: Americana.
product_description.text:
Originally made for basketball courts in the '70s. Championed by hip hop royalty in the '80s. An icon on the streets of today. 

When you think back to the first basketball shoes, amazing names come to mind. Forum, Rivalry, Streetball, Americana and Top Ten are on our shortlist of on-court greatness. And today we bring our iconic adidas Superstar back to its roots with a design that's inspired by a vintage B-ball favorite: The Americana. The red, white and blue colorway remains, just minus the hi-top. 

This shoe is just one out of our special Starting Five pack. Choose your favorite, or build your wall of fame.

product_highlights.headline: Americana logo
product_highlights.copy: Proud inscription on the tongue and heel tab make this a true collector's item.

product_highlights.headline: OG style
product_highlights.copy: The collegiate colorway of the original shoe remains – a powerful nod to its athletic roots.

product_highlights.headline: Iconic shell toe
product_highlights.copy: Originally designed to protect your toes, now a signature streetwear feature. Unmistakably adidas.

product_highlights.headline: All-day comfort
product_highlights.copy: Enjoy long-term comfort and cushioning with the memory foam OrthoLite® sockliner.

product_description.title: Superstar Shoes
product_description.subtitle: The iconic shell toe celebrates its roots.
product_description.text:
Originally made for basketball courts in the '70s. Championed by hip hop royalty in the '80s. An icon on the streets of today. 

A splash of contemporary collegiate color captures all the magic of the arena and pays homage to the most important basketball event of the year. Both a nod to the past and a cue to the new, graffiti inscription on the tongue celebrates the shoe's journey through history.

The durable rubber shell toe that helped top players shoot hoops remains. Recognized the world over. The only challenge left? Make it your own.

product_highlights.headline: Courtside celebration
product_highlights.copy: Bright streams of collegiate color take you straight to the stadium. Celebrate this year's biggest games.

product_highlights.headline: True to its name
product_highlights.copy: From the courts, to the streets. It says so on the shoe.

product_highlights.headline: Iconic shell toe
product_highlights.copy: Originally designed to protect your toes, now a signature streetwear feature. Unmistakably adidas.

product_highlights.headline: All-day comfort
product_highlights.copy: Enjoy long-term comfort and cushioning with the memory foam OrthoLite® sockliner.

product_description.title: Superstar Laceless Shoes
product_description.subtitle: A new era of 'no hassle' laceless.
product_description.text:
"We make a good team, my adidas and me." Always on point, this slip-on Superstar shoe is back like never before. Follow in the footsteps of '80s hip hop royalty and do the New York b-boy look entirely your way.  

However that plays out – chic blazer suits, scruffy jeans and tee – you'll make it look easy in this cool, casual remake. We've rebuilt the shoe with a fat tongue for extra slam dunk. Step into the future of no fuss comfort without sacrificing on old-school class.

product_highlights.headline: Low-key laceless
product_highlights.copy: Pioneered by hip hop's finest, wear this shoe with or without laces for a laidback look.

product_highlights.headline: OG energy
product_highlights.copy: A tat tongue elevates the Superstar's basketball roots.

product_highlights.headline: Classic details
product_highlights.copy: Rubber shell toebox designed to protect your toes.

product_description.title: Ultraboost 20 Shoes
product_description.subtitle: A next-gen runner born in space.
product_description.text: A legend in the making. Born in 2015, the Ultraboost revolutionized how a running shoe could fit and feel. These adidas Ultraboost 20 Shoes take the line into the future. product_highlights.headline: Responsive support

product_highlights.headline: Stitching across every millimeter
product_highlights.copy: AA sock-like Primeknit upper with Tailored Fiber Placement provides felxibibility and control.

product_highlights.headline: Signature stability
product_highlights.copy: The heel frame gives you great lockdown during your stride so you can be confident your foot is in place and protected.
